ps1.4:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ps1.4:3.3: Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.5: Kusīte puggale parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.7: Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.9: Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.11: Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, gambhīrañāṇacariyaṁ paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.13: Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pañca suttantakkhandhe paccavekkhato—
ps1.4:3.14: imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhanti.
ps1.4:4.1: Katihākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti?
ps1.4:4.2: Dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, dasahākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.4:4.3: Assaddhiyaṁ pajahanto saddhindriyaṁ bhāveti, saddhindriyaṁ bhāvento assaddhiyaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.4: kosajjaṁ pajahanto vīriyindriyaṁ bhāveti, vīriyindriyaṁ bhāvento kosajjaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.5: pamādaṁ pajahanto satindriyaṁ bhāveti, satindriyaṁ bhāvento pamādaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.6: uddhaccaṁ pajahanto samādhindriyaṁ bhāveti, samādhindriyaṁ bhāvento uddhaccaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.7: avijjaṁ pajahanto paññindriyaṁ bhāveti, paññindriyaṁ bhāvento avijjaṁ pajahati.
ps1.4:4.8: Imehi dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, imehi dasahākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.4:5.3: Assaddhiyassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā saddhindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.4: saddhindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā assaddhiyaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.5: Kosajjassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā vīriyindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.6: vīriyindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā kosajjaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.7: Pamādassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā satindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.8: satindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā pamādo pahīno hoti suppahīno.
ps1.4:5.9: Uddhaccassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā samādhindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.10: samādhindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā uddhaccaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.11: Avijjāya pahīnattā paññindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.12: paññindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā avijjā pahīnā hoti suppahīnā.
ps1.4:5.13: Imehi dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.4:6.1: Katihākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, katihākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca?
ps1.4:6.2: Catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.4: sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.6: sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.8: anāgāmiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.10: arahattaphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.11: Iti catasso maggavisuddhiyo, catasso phalavisuddhiyo, catasso samucchedavisuddhiyo, catasso paṭippassaddhivisuddhiyo.
ps1.4:6.13: imehi catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:7.9: Savanena buddho tathāgatassa sāvako khīṇāsavo bhāvitindriyo, sayaṁ bhūtaṭṭhena paccekasambuddho bhāvitindriyo, appameyyaṭṭhena tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhāvitindriyo—
ps1.4:9.1_0: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayañca
ps1.4:9.1_1: atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti, na me te,
ps1.4:9.1_2: bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā, brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā;
ps1.4:9.2: na ca panete āyasmantā sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
ps1.4:10.1_0: Ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayañca
ps1.4:10.1_1: atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti, te kho me,
ps1.4:10.1_2: bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā, brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā;
ps1.4:10.2: te ca panāyasmantā sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
ps1.4:11.5: Katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādo hoti, katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti?

ps1.4:12.2: cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayaṁ pajānāti.

ps1.4:12.6: pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.7: Pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavo hoti;
ps1.4:12.8: pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.9: Asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ hoti;
ps1.4:12.10: asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti.

ps1.4:65.8: Addhāti ekaṁsavacanametaṁ nissaṁsayavacanametaṁ nikkaṅkhavacanametaṁ advejjhavacanametaṁ adveḷhakavacanametaṁ niyogavacanametaṁ apaṇṇakavacanametaṁ avatthāpanavacanametaṁ—

ps1.4:77.2: Saddho saddhindriyaṁ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpeti, saddhassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.3: Vīriyavā vīriyindriyaṁ paggahe patiṭṭhāpeti, vīriyavato vīriyindriyaṁ paggahe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.4: Satimā satindriyaṁ upaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpeti, satimato satindriyaṁ upaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.5: Samāhito samādhindriyaṁ avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpeti, samāhitassa samādhindriyaṁ avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.6: Paññavā paññindriyaṁ dassane patiṭṭhāpeti, paññavato paññindriyaṁ dassane patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.7: Yogāvacaro pañcindriyāni nekkhamme patiṭṭhāpeti, yogāvacarassa pañcindriyāni nekkhamme patiṭṭhāpenti.
ps1.4:77.8: Yogāvacaro pañcindriyāni abyāpāde patiṭṭhāpeti, yogāvacarassa pañcindriyāni abyāpāde patiṭṭhāpenti.
ps1.4:77.9: Yogāvacaro pañcindriyāni ālokasaññāya patiṭṭhāpeti, yogāvacarassa pañcindriyāni ālokasaññāya patiṭṭhāpenti.
ps1.4:77.10: Yogāvacaro pañcindriyāni avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpeti, yogāvacarassa pañcindriyāni avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpenti …pe…

ps1.4:83.1: Puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento navahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, navahi ākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:83.2: Sekkho vipassanaṁ bhāvento dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, dasahi ākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:83.3: Vītarāgo vipassanaṁ bhāvento dvādasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, dvādasahi ākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:84.1: Puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento katamehi navahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, katamehi navahi ākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:84.2: Aniccato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, niccato anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
